Free 7-Part Series...

“How the fuck do you find UX clients?”

That's a question I saw on a forum recently. Clearly this person was at their wits-end, but you've probably asked something similar yourself (although much more sophisticatedly).

The answer isn't magic. Finding new clients can be a repeatable process that takes hours, not months - and dry spells aren't just a part of client work you have to live with forever.

But it does take knowing what to do. Now, you might be saying, “oh boy here comes the sales pitch.” Right? Wrong.

I'd like to share my process for finding high-value UX clients with you absolutely free. Give me 30 minutes and I promise you'll know exactly what to do. Let's get started.
